cells.data:
### Before Production:

 * Update CodeDeploy Permissions for code deploy user. More restrictive
 * See if Python 3.6 is available on Amazon Yum Repo.
 * Update CORS configuration on ranked-video-upload S3 bucket... lock the allowed down.

### Before Demo:
- [ ] Remove CORES oring allow all
- [ ] Spin up another app box
- [ ] RDS Setup for shared DB
- [ ] Load Test
- [ ] Setup gunicorn upstart conf
- [ ] Local_Settings.py - regen secret key
- [ ] Redo Admin p/w and setup POSTGRES DB

### July Deliverables
- [x] Profile Creation
- [x] Avatars
- [x] Video Upload
- [x] Video Transcode / Storage / Relation
- [ ] Tag / Category support for videos
- [ ] Video Ranked
- [ ] Basic Search
- [ ] Basic Analytics
- [ ] User "Friending" / Following
- [ ] Featured User increased ranking weight

### Up Next:
- [ ] Video Ranking
- [ ] Video Endpoint Tweaks
- [ ] Rate Throttling for Register and Auth

- [x] Video Auto-Transcode Capability
- [x] Video Upload Capability
- [x] Avatar Uploads functionality
- [x] [Roll in Django OAuth](quiver-note-url/1436ADF9-7D48-435E-BF0D-E6D4017DF71A)
- [x] Add authorization header to API documentation .. all secure endpoints.
- [x] Finish API Documentation
- [x] Deployment stalling during afterInstall (gunicorn direct not daemon - upstart)
- [x] Create SNS Listener for Transcode DONE / ERROR
- [x] Listen to AWS SNS for - 'RankedEncodingDone' and 'RankedEncodingFailed'
- [x] Clean up old, non finished uploading files on S3 and video relations locally.

### Small Things to tackle eventually
